thag16.6:6.1: bhogī rājāno → bhogā rājāno (bj, mr); bhojarājāno (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thag16.6:9.3: tetamanuvatteti → te maṁ anuvatteti (bj); imaṁ anuvatteti (pts1ed);
thag16.6:14.3: vase → vasī (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr mn92:16 [Selasutta]; snp4.16:875
thag16.6:21.2: aṭṭhame → aṭṭhami (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
